price: 7. Waxay (gaaladii) yidhaahdeen:“Muxuu yahay arrinka Rasuulkan uu u cuni cunto, una socon suuqyada (sidayada oo kale). Maxaa malag loola soo diri waayey ee ahaada mid la jirki wax u diga?
arabic: وَقَالُواْ مَالِ هَٰذَا ٱلرَّسُولِ يَأۡكُلُ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَيَمۡشِي فِي ٱلۡأَسۡوَاقِ لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡهِ مَلَكٞ فَيَكُونَ مَعَهُۥ نَذِيرًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqālū māli hādhā al-rasūli yakulu al-ṭaʿāma wayamshī fī al-aswāqi lawlā unzila ilayhi malakun fayakūna maʿahu nadhīran
